about_us.des: We manufacture and supply all kinds of weaving yarns such as, 100% cotton, polyester, ryon, viscos etc, for both retail and wholesale.

services.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
services.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It has comprehensive function, it can be easily used and edited. It's adapted for many kinds devices.
services.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
services.rsser: Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely, you can add rss address from the given list and add it manually.

history.nextcode_des: Now I am in Nextcode and develop website with Python code for genetic analysis.
history.netease_des: In Netease game, I learned game service system and use Python code for ops.
history.ucloud_des: In ucloud, I started to deal with servers and Linux system and use shell scripts to manage massive server.
history.college_des: At July 2013,I graduated from college and started my IT technology tour.
